source_sentence: 佛說一切如來真實攝大乘現證
translation: Buddha's teaching that all tathāgatas are truly included in the manifestation of the great vehicle

source_sentence: 三昧大教王經卷第二十四
translation: Samādhi-dajiaowang jing, vol. 24

source_sentence: 西天譯經三藏朝奉大夫試光祿卿
translation: Minister of Light for the Tripiṭaka Translation of the Sutra of the Western Paradise, the Grand Master of the Chaofeng

source_sentence: 傳法大師賜紫沙門臣施護等
translation: The Great Master Dharma transmitter bestowed the purple monk minister Shihu and others

source_sentence: 奉　詔譯
translation: translation of the imperial edict

source_sentence: 羯磨曼拏羅廣大儀軌分第二十二
translation: The Twenty-second Part of the Extensive Ritual Procedure for the Karmamāṇārāma

source_sentence: 爾時世尊。
translation: It was then that the Bhagavān entered the karmic meditation of consecration of all tathāgatas.

source_sentence: 復入一切如來灌頂羯磨三昧出生加持三摩地。
translation: He then entered the samādhi of the consecration of all tathāgatas, the karma-samādhi of birth and blessings.

source_sentence: 說此自部最上大明曰。
translation: He spoke this supreme great teaching of his own school, saying.

source_sentence: 唵(引)薩哩嚩(二合)怛他(引)誐多葛哩摩(二合)毘尸(引)計(引)吽(引一句)爾時金剛手菩薩摩訶薩。
translation: "Om (citation needed) sarīva (dichotomy) tantra (citation needed) gṛhma (dichotomy) viśe (citation needed) un (citation needed) At the time, the Vajrapāṇi Bodhisattva Mahāsattva.

source_sentence: 說此自部羯摩出生最上大明曰。
translation: He said, "This is the supreme great teaching of the birth of this personal karma," saying.

source_sentence: 唵(引)嚩日囉(二合)吽(引)哥(引)囉(引)毘尸(引)計(引)吽(引一句)爾時金剛藏菩薩摩訶薩。
translation: "Om (citation needed) vajra (citation needed) un (citation needed) gor (citation needed) r (citation needed) un (citation needed) (citation needed) one phrase.

source_sentence: 說此自部最上大明曰。
translation: He spoke this supreme great teaching of his own school, saying.

source_sentence: 唵(引)薩哩嚩(二合引)哥(引)舍薩摩多(引)毘尸(引)哥囉怛泥(二合引)吽(引一句)爾時金剛眼菩薩摩訶薩。
translation: "Om (citation needed) sarīva (citation needed) sāmata (citation needed) viśe (citation needed) korātanī (citation needed) un (citation needed) at that point, the Vajrajñāna Bodhisattva Mahāsattva.

source_sentence: 說此自部出生最上大明曰。
translation: He spoke this supreme great teaching on the birth of his own school, saying.

source_sentence: 唵(引)達哩摩(二合)毘尸(引)哥囉怛泥(二合引一句)爾時金剛巧業菩薩摩訶薩。
translation: "Om (citation needed) Darīma (dichotomy) Viśe (citation needed) Kolodanī (dichotomy citation needed), the bodhisattva Mahāsattva of Adamantine Skillful Actions at that time.

source_sentence: 說此自部最上大明曰。
translation: He spoke this supreme great teaching of his own school, saying.

source_sentence: 唵(引)尾說(引)毘尸(引)計(引一句)爾時虛空藏菩薩摩訶薩。
translation: "Om (citation needed) Weishuo (citation needed) Viśe (citation needed) Kakuda (citation needed) At the time, the Ākāśagarbha Bodhisattva Mahāsattva explained this personal karma maṇḍala.

source_sentence: 說此自部羯磨曼拏羅頌曰。
translation: He spoke this verse of his own karmic maṇḍala, saying.

source_sentence: 我今次第當演說　　最上羯磨曼拏羅　其相猶如金剛界　　此說名為寶事業　依大曼拏羅法用　　如次抨諸曼拏羅　於其中間依法儀　　應當安布佛形像　復當依諸大士法　　周匝悉畫寶大士　彼等所畫依法儀　　所有大明如是稱唵(引)囉怛那(二合)布(引)惹(引)屹哩野(三合)薩哩嚩(二合引)[口*栗]他(二合)悉提(一句)嚩日囉(二合)囉怛那(二合引)毘尸(引)計(引)吽(引)(二)唵(引)嚩日囉(二合)摩尼馱(引)[目*羅]尼三摩曳(引)吽(引一句)唵(引)摩尼囉怛那(二合引)葛哩尸(二合引一句)葛哩摩(二合)三摩曳(引)吽(引)(二)唵(引)摩尼囉怛那(二合)囉(引)誐囉底(一句)葛哩摩(二合)布(引)[口*爾](引)鉢囉(二合)嚩[口*栗]多(二合)野(二)唵(引)摩尼囉怛那(二合)娑(引)度布(引)惹(引)三摩曳(引一句)唵(引)摩賀(引)摩尼囉怛那(二合)涅哩(二合)瑟吒野(三合)葛哩尸(二合引一句)唵(引)摩尼囉怛那(二合)摩(引)羅布(引)[口*爾](引一句)唵(引)摩尼囉怛那(二合)蘇(引)哩也(二合引)路(引)哥布(引)[口*爾](引一句)唵(引)摩尼囉怛那(二合)特嚩(二合)惹鉢多(引)哥(引)布(引)[口*爾](引一句)唵(引)摩尼囉怛那(二合引)吒賀(引)娑布(引)[口*爾](引一句)唵(引)鉢訥摩(二合)摩尼三摩(引)提三摩曳(引)吽(引二句)唵(引)薩哩嚩(二合)爹(引)誐(引)耨悉蜜哩(三合)底(一句)三摩(引)提葛哩摩(二合)葛哩吽(引一句)唵(引)摩尼囉怛那(二合)的剎拏(二合)三摩曳(引)親那親那吽(引一句)唵(引)摩尼囉怛那(二合)作訖囉(二合)三摩曳(引)吽(引一句)唵(引)摩尼囉怛那(二合)婆(引)尸(引)嚩捺嚩捺吽(引一句)唵(引)摩尼囉怛那(二合)嚩哩沙(二合)尼吽(引一句)唵(引)摩尼囉怛那(二合)葛哩摩(二合)尼吽(引一句)唵(引)摩尼囉怛那(二合)葛嚩際(引)犖叉[牟*含](引一句)唵(引)摩尼囉怛那(二合)能瑟致哩(三合引一句)珂(引)那珂(引)那吽(引)(二)唵(引)摩尼囉怛那(二合)葛哩摩(二合)母瑟致(二合)吽(引一句)唵(引)摩尼囉怛那(二合)邏(引)西(引)布(引)惹曳(引)呼(引一句)唵(引)摩尼囉怛那(二合)摩(引)羅(引)毘尸(引)計(引)布(引)惹野(一句)唵(引)摩尼囉怛那(二合)詣(引)帝(引)布(引)惹野(一句)唵(引)摩尼囉怛那(二合)涅哩(二合)帝(引)布(引)惹野(一句)唵(引)摩尼囉怛那(二合)度(引)閉(引)布(引)惹野(一句)唵(引)摩尼囉怛那(二合)補瑟閉(二合引)布(引)惹野(一句)唵(引)摩尼囉怛那(二合)禰(引)閉(引)布(引)惹野(一句)唵(引)摩尼囉怛那(二合)巘提(引)布(引)惹野(一句)唵(引)摩尼囉怛那(二合引)酤舍野(二合引)葛哩沙(二合)野[口*弱](一句)唵(引)摩尼囉怛那(二合)播(引)尸(引)吽(引一句)唵(引)摩尼囉怛那(二合)塞怖(二合引)胝(引)鑁(一句)唵(引)摩尼囉怛那(二合引)吠(引)舍惡(一句)此曼拏羅中所有法用。

source_sentence: 皆依廣大儀軌作已。
translation: They're all created according to a broad set of rituals.

source_sentence: 依法當引本部弟子入曼拏羅。
translation: According to the teaching, this group of disciples should be led into the maṇḍala.

source_sentence: 入已謂言。
translation: After he enters, he says.

source_sentence: 汝不應以此祕密法輒為人說。
translation: "You shouldn't readily explain this secret teaching to others.

source_sentence: 無令建立業障深厚速趣命終。
translation: It won't cause the karmic hindrances that build up to be so deep that they'll quickly end up in life.

source_sentence: 然後教授寶羯磨智頌曰。
translation: He then taught this verse of the wisdom of the precious karma, saying.

source_sentence: 所有金剛藏大印　　妙等引心依法結　此印普作諸供養　　即得一切佛敬愛　所有最勝三昧印　　三摩地心正一結　供養一切佛世尊　　即得自部寶灌頂　金剛藏尊三摩地　　妙等引心當觀想　供養一切佛世尊　　調伏世間為最上　金剛藏尊三摩地　　當結羯磨所成印　供養一切佛世尊　　剎那獲得諸義利此等大明曰。
translation: "Regarding the great seal of the Vajragarbha, which is formed according to the rules of the Dharma and which is universally used to make offerings, it will obtain the respect of all buddhas. Regarding the most excellent concentration seal, which is formed by correctly binding the mind in samādhi and making offerings to all the buddhas, it will obtain the consecration of its own treasures. The Vajragarbha honored samādhi, which is formed by correctly binding the mind in samādhi and making offerings to all the buddhas, will be the most distinguished in the world in terms of its control. The Vajragarbha honored samādhi will be the seal formed by binding the karma and making offerings to all the buddhas, and it will obtain all the benefits of the moment.

source_sentence: 唵(引)囉怛那(二合)布(引)惹(引)嚩尸(引)酤嚕(一句)唵(引)囉怛那(二合)布(引)惹(引)三摩野(引)毘詵左(一句)唵(引)囉怛那(二合)布(引)惹(引)達哩摩(二合)那(引)舍野鉢鼎(一句)唵(引)囉怛那(二合)布(引)惹(引)葛哩摩(二合)薩哩嚩(二合引)[口*栗]湯(二合)彌(引)捺捺(一句)次說祕密印羯磨智法。
translation: "Om (citation) rattana (b) pu (citation) jag (citation) vajji (citation) roru (one phrase) Om (citation) rattana (b) pu (citation) jag (citation) samādhi (citation) vibhisa (one phrase) Om (citation) rattana (b) pu (citation) jag (citation) darimā (b) nā (citation) sarimā (b) [mouth * chestnut] tang (b) mi (citation) nadir (one phrase) Next, he explained the wisdom of the esoteric seal karma.

source_sentence: 蓮華金剛杵相合　　金剛藏尊三摩地　供養一切佛世尊　　得諸世間悉敬愛然後如其所說即得最上大印智成就。
translation: By combining the lotus flower, the vajra, and the pounder, the vajra-store honored samādhi is offered to all the buddhas and world-honored ones, and then, according to what they say, they'll attain the accomplishment of the supreme great seal of wisdom.

source_sentence: 次說三昧印智法。
translation: Next, he explains the method of the wisdom of the samādhi seal.

source_sentence: 以大金剛寶相合　　於諸分位當安布　金剛事業法相應　　如教所說依次第次說此部法印智。
translation: By combining the great adamantine jewels, he'll arrange them in various positions, and the vajra works will correspond with the Dharma as taught, explaining this part of Dharma-marking wisdom in order.

source_sentence: 唾
translation: Spit it out!

source_sentence: [口*弱]
translation: [mouth*weak]

source_sentence: 誐
translation: to intone

source_sentence: 度
translation: to cross over

source_sentence: 怛那(二合一句)
translation: dāna (a phrase in two parts)

source_sentence: [口*弱]
translation: [mouth*weak]

source_sentence: 覩
translation: to see

source_sentence: 娑
translation: to dance

source_sentence: 哩摩(二合一句)
translation: rīma (two combined phrases)

source_sentence: 剎拏(二合一句)
translation: (Skt. jñāna) (a two-comment phrase)

source_sentence: 覩
translation: to see

source_sentence: 沙
translation: sand

source_sentence: 哩摩(二合一句)
translation: rīma (two combined phrases)

source_sentence: 叉
translation: to clasp the hands

source_sentence: 叉
translation: to clasp the hands

source_sentence: 提
translation: carry

source_sentence: 當以二羽作金剛寶。
translation: He'll use the two feathers to make a vajra treasure.

source_sentence: 即成此部諸羯磨印。
translation: This will form the seal of this group of karmas.

source_sentence: 一切如來真實攝一切儀軌隨應方便廣大教理分第二十三之一爾時世尊。
translation: The Tathāgatas Really Gather All Rituals, According to the Methods, Vast Teaching, and Doctrine Part 23.1 At the time, the Bhagavān was again in the precious seal samādhi.

source_sentence: 復入寶印三摩地。
translation: He again entered the samādhi of the precious seal.

source_sentence: 說此自部最上大明曰。
translation: He spoke this most excellent great teaching of his own school, saying.

source_sentence: 唵(引)嚩日囉(二合)囉怛泥(二合引)怛囕(二合引一句)爾時金剛手菩薩摩訶薩。
translation: "Om (citation) vajra-rā (dichotomy) rātanī (dichotomy) rātanaja (dichotomy)." At that point, Vajrapāṇi Bodhisattva Mahāsattva explained this great luminosity of his own seal.

source_sentence: 說此自印大明曰。
translation: He spoke this great luminous statement of his own sign, saying.

source_sentence: 唵(引)嚩日囉(二合)摩(引)梨(引)吽(引一句)爾時金剛藏菩薩摩訶薩。
translation: "Om (citation needed) vajrajīra (binary) mo (citation needed) un (citation needed)." At that point, the Vajragarbha Bodhisattva Mahāsattva explained this great teaching of his own sign.

source_sentence: 說此自印大明曰。
translation: He spoke this great luminous statement of his own sign, saying.

source_sentence: 唵(引)摩尼囉怛泥(二合引)吽(引一句)爾時金剛眼菩薩摩訶薩。
translation: "Om (citation needed) moira tanyi (citation needed) un (citation needed)".

source_sentence: 說此自印大明曰。
translation: He spoke this great teaching on self-direction, saying.

source_sentence: 唵(引)達哩摩(二合)囉怛泥(二合引)吽(引一句)爾時金剛巧業菩薩摩訶薩。
translation: "Om (citation needed) Darīma (binary) Rātanī (binary) Un (citation needed) At that point, the Bodhisattva of Adamantine Skillful Actions, Mahāsaṃbhava, said this great statement of his own seal.

source_sentence: 說此自印大明曰。
translation: He spoke this great clarification of his own sign, saying.

source_sentence: 唵(引)尾說沒哩(二合)瑟致(二合一句)爾時虛空藏菩薩摩訶薩。
translation: "Om (citation needed) Weishuo boli (dichotomy) seizi (dichotomy in one sentence), then the Ākāśagarbha Bodhisattva Mahāsattva explained the four-seal maṇḍala of the Self-Pronged Division.

source_sentence: 說自寶部四印曼拏羅頌曰。
translation: He spoke the verse of the four-seal maṇḍala of the Vairocana school, saying.

source_sentence: 我今次第當演說　　最上四印曼拏羅　依前四印壇法儀　　如次分別此壇相然後如教所說入曼拏羅。
translation: "Now, I will explain in order the surpassing four-seal maṇḍala. Relying on the rituals of the previous four-seal altar, I will discern the characteristics of this altar in order and then enter the maṇḍala as I've taught it.

source_sentence: 謂弟子言汝慎勿應輒說此法等。
translation: He told his disciple, "Sir, you mustn't lightly expound this teaching.

source_sentence: 次為教授智出生法。
translation: Next, he teaches the method of the birth of wisdom.

source_sentence: 以大金剛寶相合　　住金剛寶三摩地　成印安置於額間　　即得一切成就法此大明曰。
translation: By uniting the great adamantine jewels together and abiding in the vajra treasure samādhi, he forms a seal and places it between his foreheads, thereby attaining the accomplishment of all things.

source_sentence: 唵(引)嚩日囉(二合)囉怛那(二合)薩哩嚩(二合引)毘尸(引)哥(一句)薩哩嚩(二合)悉馱踰(引)彌(引)鉢囉(二合)野蹉(二)囉羅囉羅吽(引)怛囉(二合)(三)次為說示祕密印法。
translation: "Om (citation) vajra (binary) ratana (binary) sarīva (binary) viśe (citation) ko (a phrase) sarīva (binary) siddhânta (citation) mi (citation) pala (binary) naocha (binary) rara rara un (citation) ratana (binary) (c) Next, we'll explain and show the esoteric seal method.

source_sentence: 世間所愛善愛者　　若男若女亦復然　相合成印在額間　　即得祕密法成就此成就大明曰。
translation: "Whether it's a man or a woman who's well-liked in the world, it's likewise the case that when you put the seal of unity between your foreheads, you'll attain the accomplishment of the secret dharma.

source_sentence: 唵(引)嚩日囉(二合)囉怛那(二合)薩契尾[寧*也](切身引)達囉怛網(二合一句)鉢囉(二合)野蹉尸(引)竭囕(二合)阿毘詵左(引)呬(二)訶訶訶訶怛囉(二合)(三)然後如教所說教授結彼四種印契。
translation: "Om (citation) vajra (binary) ratana (binary) sakhi wey [ning*ya] (cut body citation) dharatanet (binary) prajñā (binary) noches (citation) khaṭṭṭha (binary) abhisaṃsa (citation) frey (binary) hahahahaha (binary) (citation) then form those four kinds of seals as taught.

source_sentence: 亦然作彼四種成就。
translation: They also thus perform those four kinds of accomplishment.

source_sentence: 爾時虛空藏菩薩摩訶薩。
translation: It was then that the Ākāśagarbha Bodhisattva Mahāsattva.

source_sentence: 復說此一切義成就大明曰。
translation: He also explained this accomplishment of all meanings in the great teaching.

source_sentence: 唵(引)嚩日囉(二合)摩尼達囉(一句)薩哩嚩(二合引)[口*栗]他(二合)悉亭彌(引)鉢囉(二合)野蹉呼(引)(二)婆誐鑁嚩日囉(二合)囉怛那(二合)吽(引)(三)次說此曼拏羅頌曰。
translation: "Om (citation needed) vajra (dichotomy) maṇidarā (a phrase) sarīva (dichotomy) [mouthed*khruta (dichotomy) setinmi (citation needed) pala (dichotomy) nosho (citation needed) (b) bāgaṅga (dichotomy) vajra (dichotomy) un (citation needed) (c) Next, he spoke this maṇḍala verse, saying.

source_sentence: 我今復次當演說　　大曼拏羅勝無上　依一切義成就壇　　如前法用周遍畫次說祕密智印智法。
translation: "Now, I will again explain the great maṇḍala, which is unsurpassed, accomplishes the altar based on all meanings, and then explains the teaching of the seal of esoteric wisdom according to the preceding pervasive drawing of the Dharma.

source_sentence: 所有色等五欲境　　不捨離故受諸樂　以此奉獻佛世尊　　即得成就諸儀軌所有四種印智法。
translation: "Regarding the five desirable objects such as form and so forth, he doesn't part with them and therefore experiences their pleasures. By presenting this to the Bhagavān, he'll attain the accomplishment of all four kinds of rituals and regulations that contain the wisdom of signs.

source_sentence: 即以如是幀像等及大士印契。
translation: That's how he uses such framed images and so forth and the mudrās of the great personage.

source_sentence: 左月曼拏羅中。
translation: He placed them in the left moon-moon maṇḍala.

source_sentence: 依法畫已。
translation: After he draws them according to the teaching, he'll create the task he seeks to accomplish.

source_sentence: 當作所求成就事業。
translation: He'll then perform the task he seeks to accomplish.

source_sentence: 爾時一切如來又復雲集。
translation: At that point, all the tathāgatas again gathered in great numbers.

source_sentence: 咸共稱讚虛空藏菩薩摩訶薩。
translation: They all praised the Ākāśagarbha Bodhisattva Mahāsattva together.

source_sentence: 說是頌曰。
translation: They spoke this verse, saying.

source_sentence: 金剛薩埵善哉者　　金剛大寶復善哉　善哉金剛妙法門　　善哉金剛勝羯磨　能善宣說此正法　　無上金剛祕密乘　一切如來祕密門　　大乘現證法中攝爾時金剛手菩薩摩訶薩。
translation: "Good, Vajrasattva! Good, Vajragarbha, the great jewel! Good, Vajragarbha, the wonderful dharma-gate! Good, Vajragarbha, the excellent karma-master who well explains this right teaching, the unsurpassed Vajra esoteric vehicle, the esoteric gate of all tathāgatas, and the great vehicle, the manifestly realized Dharma that's included in the Dharma.

source_sentence: 宣說諸部大真實法廣大教理。
translation: He explained the vast teaching and principle of the great true dharma of all the schools.

source_sentence: 此中先當通說大印最上成就教理。
translation: Here, he'll first explain in detail the teaching and principle of the supreme accomplishment of the great seal.

source_sentence: 頌曰。
translation: The verse says.

source_sentence: 所有如來大印契　　成結周遍等空界　諸佛影像安立成　　從心中入而廣大　若有於此現生中　　欲求最上寂靜法　除成佛事外復無　　彼成就法能過上次說如來部諸印最上成就教理。
translation: "The Tathāgata's great seal agreement, the formation of bonds that completely pervade the realm of equal space, and the images of the buddhas that are posited, enter from the mind, and become vast. If there's anyone in this present life who wants to pursue the most tranquil dharma, there's nothing besides the accomplishment of buddhahood that accomplishes the teaching and principle that surpasses the previous explanation of the most accomplished seals of the Tathāgata School.

source_sentence: 大印頌曰。
translation: The verse of the great seal says.

source_sentence: 大印依法而相合　　此即大士尊所說　一切教跡我悉隨　　大士法用而觀想　若有於此現生中　　欲求菩薩勝善果　己身辨事外復無　　彼成就法能過上三昧印最上成就教理。
translation: "When the great seal is combined with the Dharma, this is what the venerable Tathāgata teaches, and I will follow all the traces of the teaching and contemplate the Tathāgata's Dharma function. If there's anyone in this present life who wants to pursue the bodhisattva's excellent and good achievements, there's nothing besides the task of discerning himself that accomplishes the teaching and principle that surpasses the supreme accomplishment of the superior seal of samādhi.

source_sentence: 如執金剛成就法　　我此亦然作觀想　成佛菩薩外復無　　彼成就法能過上法印最上成就教理。
translation: Just as I grasp the accomplished Dharma of the vajras, so do I contemplate that there's nothing outside of the buddhas and bodhisattvas who have accomplished it that surpasses the superior seal of the Dharma and the most accomplished teaching and principle.

source_sentence: 所有自性清淨語　　此即一切法所說　得成佛事外復無　　彼成就法能過上羯磨印最上成就教理。
translation: There's nothing outside of the pure speech of the essential nature that's explained by all the things that become buddhas that accomplishes something that surpasses the supreme accomplishment of the seal of karma, the most accomplished teaching and principle.

source_sentence: 諸種一切處清淨　　一切事業亦清淨　成佛菩薩外復無　　彼成就法能過上復次金剛手菩薩摩訶薩。
translation: There's nothing beyond the fact that all kinds of places are purified, and all undertakings are purified, and that accomplishes a teaching that surpasses the most accomplished principle of the karmic seal of the most accomplished bodhisattva, the Vajrapāṇi Mahāsattva.

source_sentence: 宣說本部最上成就教理。
translation: He teaches this part of the teaching and principle of supreme accomplishment.

source_sentence: 先說大印最上成就教理。
translation: First, he explains the doctrine of the supreme accomplishment of the great seal.

source_sentence: 佛智為利諸有情　　設諸成就方便法　依法觀想大印成　　於現生中得成佛三昧印最上成就教理。
translation: "Buddha's wisdom designates accomplishment methods for the benefit of sentient beings based on the method of observing the accomplishment of the great seal. In this present life, he attains the accomplishment of the buddha-samādhi seal, the supreme accomplishment teaching and principle.

source_sentence: 如執金剛成就法　　我此亦然作觀想　大印方便依法成　　剎那得成菩薩位法印最上成就教理。
translation: Just as I hold to the accomplishment of the vajra, I also contemplate here the accomplishment of the great seal according to the method and the method according to which I'll attain the bodhisattvahood in a flash, the teaching and principle of the supreme accomplishment of the seal of the Dharma.

source_sentence: 一切法本無文字　　是中戲論無所有　此說即是勝法門　　觀想得成菩薩位羯磨印最上成就教理。
translation: "All dharmas are originally without words, and this conceptualization is the ultimate teaching that conceals the accomplishment of the bodhisattva position's karma-seal, the supreme accomplishment of the doctrine.

source_sentence: 隨有所作諸事業　　是中若淨若非淨　悉以奉獻佛世尊　　剎那得成菩薩位復次金剛手菩薩摩訶薩。
translation: Whatever undertaking is created, whether pure or impure, it's dedicated to the Buddha, the Bhagavān, and he attains the bodhisattvahood in a flash.

source_sentence: 宣說蓮華部最上成就教理。
translation: He taught the doctrine of the Padmasaṃbhava's supreme accomplishment.

source_sentence: 先說大印最上成就教理。
translation: First, he explained the doctrine of the supreme accomplishment of the great seal.

source_sentence: 貪法本來性清淨　　外事畢竟無所有　此中離貪法亦無　　是即大乘中成就三昧印最上成就教理。
translation: 'The original nature of craving for things is pure, and external things are ultimately nonexistent. This is the paramount accomplishment of the great vehicle's accomplishment of the seal of samādhi.'

source_sentence: 慣習事謂大慈心　　堅固三摩地法用　廣大如教說相應　　剎那得成菩薩位法印最上成就教理。
translation: The habituated condition is a mind of great kindness, a resolute samādhi, the Dharma function, and a vast teaching that corresponds with the attainment of the bodhisattvahood in a flash, the supreme accomplishment of the seal of Dharma, and the doctrine of the teaching.

source_sentence: 貪法自性本清淨　　此教最初作是說　貪波羅蜜得圓成　　剎那獲成菩薩位羯磨印最上成就教理。
translation: The intrinsic nature of craving for dharmas is originally pure, and this is how the teaching first explained it: "The perfection of the perfection of craving for the perfection of the bodhisattvahood, the karmic seal of supreme accomplishment of the teaching principle is attained in a single moment.

source_sentence: 所有一切見與聞　　若覺若知亦復然　我及一切諸有情　　常令普盡苦邊際復次金剛手菩薩摩訶薩。
translation: 'It's the same for all who see and hear, for those who perceive and know, and for me and all sentient beings, that we will always cause the limit of suffering to be completely ended.' Furthermore, Vajrapāṇi Bodhisattva Mahāsa.

source_sentence: 宣說寶部最上成就教理。
translation: He teaches the Jewel Division's teaching and principle of supreme accomplishment.

source_sentence: 先說大印最上成就教理。
translation: First, he explains the doctrine of the supreme accomplishment of the great seal.

source_sentence: 由一切佛灌頂我　　是故得成金剛藏　而此觀想遍無性　　剎那得成菩薩位三昧印最上成就教理。
translation: 'Because I was consecrated by all the buddhas, I was able to become a vajra store, and this contemplation was pervasive and natureless, and I was able to instantaneously achieve the bodhisattvahood samādhi seal of supreme accomplishment,' he said.

source_sentence: 一切有情令得此　　隨諸意願悉圓滿　虛空藏尊等無差　　剎那得成菩薩位法印最上成就教理。
translation: All sentient beings will attain this, and according to their wishes, their vows will all be fulfilled, and the Ākāśagarbha honored one will be equally and without distinction, and they'll attain the bodhisattva position of the supreme accomplishment of the seal of Dharma in a single moment.

source_sentence: 充當己身棄捨已　　然復歡喜施珍財　說法成印語莊嚴　　現生得成菩薩位羯磨印最上成就教理。
translation: After he has abandoned himself, he then joyfully gives away precious treasures, explains the Dharma as a seal, and speaks adornedly. In this life, he'll attain the bodhisattva status of the seal of karma, the most accomplished teaching and principle.

source_sentence: 若欲利益諸貧者　　出生財寶為最上　勤求菩薩外復無　　彼成就法能過上如上是為諸部諸印。
translation: If someone wants to benefit the poor, producing wealth and treasure is the greatest, and there's nothing outside of diligently pursuing bodhisattvahood that accomplishes a teaching that's superior to the above, these are the seals of the various [buddha-bodhisattva] schools.

source_sentence: 得佛菩薩最上成就廣大教理。
translation: They attain the bodhisattva's supreme accomplishment of the vast teaching and principle.

source_sentence: 復次金剛手菩薩摩訶薩。
translation: Furthermore, Vajrapāṇi Bodhisattva Mahāsattva.

source_sentence: 宣說諸部三昧成就教理。
translation: He teaches the accomplished doctrine of the samādhi of the various schools.

source_sentence: 謂先通說一切如來三昧成就教理。
translation: That is, first he explains in detail the teaching and principle of the accomplishment of samādhi by all tathāgatas.

source_sentence: 若與貪染相合故　　即彼貪染自清淨　乃是諸佛大印門　　此說名為智三昧如來部三昧成就教理。
translation: If it's combined with the defilement of desire, then that defilement of desire is purified on its own, and it's the great seal of the buddhas' approach. This is called the wisdom samādhi, and it's called the Tathāgata's teaching and principle of the accomplishment of samādhi.

source_sentence: 若不捨離諸欲貪　　即是三昧大妙理　此如來部清淨門　　諸佛尚不敢違越金剛部三昧成就教理。
translation: If one doesn't abandon desire and greed, then this is the great and wonderful principle of samādhi. This is the pure gate of the Tathāgata School, and the buddhas still dare not transgress the Jingang Division's accomplishment of samādhi as a teaching principle.

source_sentence: 諸佛本無忿怒心　　利有情故現忿怒　此大金剛部法門　　三昧無有違越者蓮華部三昧成就教理。
translation: The buddhas originally had no angry thoughts, and they became angry because they were for the benefit of sentient beings. This is the great vajra group's approach to dharma and samādhi, which is unsurpassed by the lotus group's accomplishment of samādhi and the doctrine.

source_sentence: 以彼自性清淨智　　若欲作事隨應作　此大蓮華部法門　　三昧無有違越者寶部三昧成就教理。
translation: Because of this pure cognition of their own nature, if they want to do something, they should do it accordingly. This is the teaching and principle accomplished by the Lotus School, the school of samādhi that has nothing contrary to the Jewel School.

source_sentence: 所有若少若多性　　隨所樂欲法亦然　不空事業日常行　　此即是為施三昧如上是為諸部三昧教理。
translation: Whether it has a small or large nature, it's likewise whatever desires it has. It's not an empty undertaking performed every day. This is the samādhi of generosity, and the above is the doctrine and principles of the sections' samādhis.

source_sentence: 復次金剛手菩薩摩訶薩。
translation: "Furthermore, Vajrapāṇi Bodhisattva Mahāsattva.

source_sentence: 宣說諸部法成就教理。
translation: He teaches the doctrine of the accomplishment of the teachings of the various schools.

source_sentence: 謂先通說一切如來法成就教理。
translation: That is, first he explains in detail the teaching and principle of the accomplishment of the Dharma of all tathāgatas.

source_sentence: 此中佛無法可說　　無說已即法爾字　乃為佛法大印門　　是即大智最上法如來部法成就教理。
translation: Here, the Buddha has nothing to teach, and the word 'Dharma' after he teaches it is the great seal of the Buddha's teaching. This is the teaching and principle of the Tathāgata's accomplishment of the most excellent Dharma of great wisdom.

source_sentence: 貪染清淨無復上　　是中常施諸法樂　此如來部妙法門　　羯磨成就最上作金剛部法成就教理。
translation: There's nothing higher than the purity of craving and defilement, which is the constant giving of pleasure to all dharmas. This is the Tathāgata School's wonderful teaching, the accomplishment of karma, and the supreme work, the accomplishment of the Vajra School's teaching and principle.

source_sentence: 諸佛教勅清淨義　　救度有情利亦然　無忿怒中忿恚生　　破諸魔惡得成就蓮華部法成就教理。
translation: It's the same principle that Buddhapama purifies the meaning of saving sentient beings and the benefits of liberating them from anger.

source_sentence: 蓮華處染而無染　　貪性亦然無所著　此說若知外事無　　設作諸罪亦無染寶部法成就教理。
translation: "Where the lotus is defiled, it's undefiled; the nature of desire is likewise unattached. If this teaching knows that external things are nonexistent, even if they are committed, the sins are still undefiled.

source_sentence: 平等布施無有法　　真實所行說亦然　此寶部法外復無　　彼成就法能過上如上是為諸部法成就教理。
translation: Equally generous, lacking any dharma, and truly carried out, it's likewise explained that there's nothing outside of this jeweled group of dharmas that surpasses the above in accomplishing the teaching and principle of the accomplishment of the dharma of the groups.

source_sentence: 佛說一切如來真實攝大乘現證三昧大教王經卷第二十四
translation: Foshuo yiqie rulai zuisheng dasheng xiangshi sanmei dajiaowang jing roll twenty-four
